title: Tentacle plant
text: Seeing I've logged alot about the various animals I thought I would take some time to log some local fauna.
This spore like plant with large tentacles, while nasty looking, was in fact very soft, almost silky to touch.
It was carbon based, and with no toxins detected, I couldn't resist eating a little bit.
Tasted like it looked, won't be eating that again.
